name: Big Building Go Boom
description:
7D3D #3 Game Jam

This is a small project that uses physics and simple game mechanics to create a building destruction simulator. The idea behind it was to see how interesting we could make a the mechanics in a short amount of time (we joined the jam with about two days remaining). There are only ten levels to the game so far.

Controls

  • Camera : WASD
  • Destroy Block : Left Mouse Button
  • Reset Level : R

Team

  • James Lee - Programmer, Music
  • Christine Nguyen - Game Design
